text:
Bruno Marsswept the 2018 Grammys, but it was one woman (with an epic set of pearl necklaces) whose presence piqued the internet’s curiosity.

The pop superstar took the Madison Square Yard stage several times tonight, often backed by an entourage of hitmakers that helped him win a total of seven awards. Representing late sound engineer Tom Coyne was his wife Mary-Kay Coyne, who joined Mars onstage as he accepted Album of the Year.

Coyne succumbed to a battle with cancer earlier this year, and is credited as the master engineer on Mars’ album 24K Magic. He won past Grammys for his work with Adele, Taylor Swift and Sam Smith.
title: Bruno Mars’ Mystery Guest Onstage at the 2018 Grammys Explained – The Daily Gawk
